text.title: Abadan
text.head: Abadan
text.p: Abadan is a city in Iran.
text.head: Get in
By plane

list.item: Abadan Airport ( ABD ). Iran Air - Isfahan, Tehran (Mehrabad Airport). Iran Air Tours - Isfahan, Mashad, Shiraz, Tehran (Mehrabad Airport). Iran Aseman Airlines - Dubai, Shiraz. Kish Airlines - Tehran (Mehrabad Airport)

text.head: By train
text.p: Nearest railway station is in Khorramshahr, about 10 kilometers north of Abadan. Daytime trains from Ahvaz as well as overnight trains from Tehran and Mashad are available.
text.head: By ferry
text.p: There are river ferries from Basra, in Iraq, to nearby Khorramshahr several times per week. The ferry is run by Valfajr Shipping Company and journey time is just under one hour.
text.head: Get around
See

list.item: Khorramshahr Holy Defence Cultural Center (War Museum), Ahmad Abad Avenue (Next to Naft (Oil) University). Museum reveal Abadan and Khuzestan's ancient history as well as the Iran-Iraq war, specifically how Abadan was successfully defended by the Iranians against the Iraqi invaders.
